Recently I've discovered the joy of travelling in Japan, and have been publishing my personal travel stories and video highlights to show people the limitless sceneries Japan has to offer!

resume.skillmessage: These are some technical skills that I have accumulated through my experiences

education.description: Focused in Interaction Design, I found my passion for UI design while learning human-computer interaction methodologies and processes. Internship opportunities exposed me to SDLC and end-to-end development, which greatly helped me in understanding the development process in production-level applications.

work.title: Graduate Analyst
work.description: As a full-stack Java developer, I worked in a development team that was responsible for maintaining the CRM application of the client. My responsibilities include developing new features for the current application based on user stories translated by the Business Analyst, preparing release package for various deployment cycles, peer code reviews, and code refactoring to adhere to proper coding standards and optimizing application performance.

work.title: Engineering Intern
work.description: Working as a frontend web intern, I was tasked to refine existing features and create new components while revamping the web application. Based on designs from the UX designer, I created new cards on the revamped landing page, and modified existing features according to the new designs given.
